author: newsytoday
title: Hardangervidda's Closed Roads: Fylkesveiers Affected by Landslides
text:
New Snowfall Prompts Road Closures and Travel Alerts in Norway
Weather conditions are dynamic across Norway, leading to road closures and travel warnings. The Norwegian Public Roads Administration ( Statens vegvesen ) has issued a traffic update, urging drivers to take precautions on major routes.
Rv7 : Delays Expected, Travelers Advised to Prepare
On Rv7, a new assessment will take place at 8 PM on Thursday. Live webcam feeds show snowfall and strong winds in the area. Motorists are encouraged to pack essential supplies such as food, warm drinks, and extra layers of clothing.
Fv50 Hol-Aurland: Queueing Traffic
During Thursday afternoon, queueing traffic was implemented on Fv50 Hol-Aurland. This measure is set to continue until Friday afternoon, according to the traffic message.
Snowslide Risks Close Roads in Stad and Stryn Apart from these developments, several roads were shut down at 6 PM due to snowslide risks:
Fv5744 between Navelsaker and Heggjabygda in Stad Fv5724 Eide-Briksdal Fv5723 Vassenden-BÃ¸dal in Stryn Drivers are advised to check the latest road conditions and plan their journeys accordingly. Stay informed and drive safely during this winter weather.
